SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_DESC FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M T101 WHERE T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '050101L'
AND T101.${searchKey} LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
ORDER BY T101.OBJ_NM

SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_DESC , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T104.OBJ_ID AS PATH_OBJ_ID , T104.OBJ_NM AS PATH_OBJ_NM , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS SYSGRP , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS IFGBN , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS IF_FIX_DT , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS IMPLMETHD , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS IMPL_TOOL , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 106 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS BDP_DATA_ENGNR_UP , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 107 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS BDP_CHRGR_CNS , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS PRIORRANK , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 109 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS OPRNCHRAG , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 110 THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS OPRNTEAM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D T102 ON ( T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.OBJ_ID = T101.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M T103 ON ( (T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'CM_SYS_SYSGRP' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL) OR (T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'CM_SYS_IFGBN' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL) OR (T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'CM_SYS_IMPLMETHD' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL) OR (T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'SYS_PRIORRANK' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL)
OR (T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'CM_SYS_OPRNTEAM' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 110 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL) ) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T104.OBJ_ID = T101.PATH_OBJ_ID ) WHERE T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '050102L' AND T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = '050101L' AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = #{objId} GROUP BY T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_DESC , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T104.OBJ_ID , T104.OBJ_NM ORDER BY T101.OBJ_NM

SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , REPLACE(REPLACE(T101.OBJ_DESC,CHR(10),' '),CHR(13),' ') AS OBJ_DESC, T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T104.OBJ_ID AS PATH_OBJ_ID , T104.OBJ_NM AS PATH_OBJ_NM , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS SYSGRP , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS IFGBN , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS IF_FIX_DT , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS IMPLMETHD , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS IMPL_TOOL , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 106 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS BDP_DATA_ENGNR_UP , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 107 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS BDP_CHRGR_CNS , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS PRIORRANK , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 109 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS OPRNCHRAG , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 110 THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS OPRNTEAM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D T102 ON ( T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.OBJ_ID = T101.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M T103 ON ( (T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'CM_SYS_SYSGRP' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL) OR (T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'CM_SYS_IFGBN' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL) OR (T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'CM_SYS_IMPLMETHD' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL) OR (T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'SYS_PRIORRANK' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL)
OR (T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'CM_SYS_OPRNTEAM' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 110 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL) ) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T104.OBJ_ID = T101.PATH_OBJ_ID ) WHERE T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '050102L'
AND T101.${searchKey} LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
GROUP BY T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_DESC , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T104.OBJ_ID , T104.OBJ_NM ORDER BY T101.OBJ_NM

SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_DESC , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS DBTYPE , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS BASE_DB_YN , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS APP_CONNTYPE , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS SVR_NM , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS SVR_IP , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 106 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS SVR_LOC , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 107 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS SRC_DB_ID , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS SRC_DB_SMRY_DESC , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 109 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS SVR_DB_DESC , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 110 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DB_CONNINFO , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 111 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DB_VER , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 112 THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS ACC_TRGT_YN , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 113 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS LANG_INFO , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 114 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS OS_DB_CHRGR , MAX( CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 115THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS LAST_USE_YN FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D T102 ON ( T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.OBJ_ID = T101.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M T103 ON ( (T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'SYS_DBTYPE' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL) OR (T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'SYS_YN' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ IN (102, 112, 115) AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL) OR (T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'CM_SYS_CONNTYPE' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL) ) WHERE T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '050103L'
AND T101.${searchKey} LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
GROUP BY T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_DESC ORDER BY T101.OBJ_NM
